result.eng: I love being outside in the open air.
result.ga: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI love being outside in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI love being outside in the open air.

result.html: An bhfuil an doras oscailteIs the door open?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil an doras oscailteIs the door open?

result.eng: Do you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.
result.ga: An miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - Ní miste
result.orig: An miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - Ní miste
result.html: An miste leat má osclaím an fhuinneog - Ní misteDo you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.
result.ponchtml: An miste leat má osclaím an ḟuinneog - Ní misteDo you mind if I open the window? - No I don't.

result.eng: Press the button to open the door.
result.ga: Brúigh an cnaipe chun an doras a oscailt
result.orig: Brúigh an cnaipe chun an doras a oscailt
result.html: Brúigh an cnaipe chun an doras a oscailtPress the button to open the door.
result.ponchtml: Brúiġ an cnaipe ċun an doras a oscailtPress the button to open the door.

result.eng: I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI love being out in the open air.

result.ga: Is ábhar le plé é seo
result.orig: Is ábhar le plé é seo
result.html: Is ábhar le plé é seoThis is open to discussion.
result.ponchtml: Is áḃar le plé é seoThis is open to discussion.

result.eng: She made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ga: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.orig: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.html: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí osna faoisiṁ nuair a ċonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.

result.ga: Oscail an doras le do thoil
result.orig: Oscail an doras le do thoil
result.html: Oscail an doras le do thoilOpen the door, please.
result.ponchtml: Oscail an doras le do ṫoilOpen the door, please.

result.html: Oscail do bhéalOpen your mouth.
result.ponchtml: Oscail do ḃéalOpen your mouth.

result.eng: Watch out, your bag is open!
result.ga: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.orig: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.html: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!
result.ponchtml: Seaċain tá do ṁála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!

result.eng: The pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ga: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíoċas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.

result.html: Tá an siopa ar oscailtThe shop is open.
result.ponchtml: Tá an siopa ar oscailtThe shop is open.

result.eng: I am going to open the window.
result.ga: Tá mé chun an fhuinneog a oscailt
result.orig: Tá mé chun an fhuinneog a oscailt
result.html: Tá mé chun an fhuinneog a oscailtI am going to open the window.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ċun an ḟuinneog a oscailtI am going to open the window.

result.eng: Open the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.
result.ga: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailt
result.orig: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailt
result.html: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailtOpen the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.
result.ponchtml: Oscail an bosca a Ṁama Níl mé in ann é a oscailtOpen the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.

result.eng: Open the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ga: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.orig: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.html: Oscail an doras a Thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ponchtml: Oscail an doras a Ṫomáis agus tóg amaċ an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.

result.eng: There's a new Italian place open in the city centre.
result.ga: Tá áit nua Iodálach oscailte i lár na cathrach
result.orig: Tá áit nua Iodálach oscailte i lár na cathrach
result.html: Tá áit nua Iodálach oscailte i lár na cathrachThere's a new Italian place open in the city centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá áit nua Iodálaċ oscailte i lár na caṫraċThere's a new Italian place open in the city centre.

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Téim ar ẛiúlóidí fada de ġnáṫ ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
